incident: NOTICE: Funds deposited before May 10 are temporarily locked while we attempt to recover from a data loss incident. We had to restore our database from a day-old backup so we need to ensure that balances and payment history are corrected to account for all activity that occurred during that period before we can release funds. We don't have an ETA at this time but we are working diligently to resolve the issue. We are sincerely sorry for the inconvenience.

accounts.maxfeeDesc: The default is 1% of the payment value if this is not set
accounts.name: Name
accounts.passwordWarning: If you lose this password you won't be able to withdraw funds from the account or restore your seed phrase. We can't recover it for you.

adam.name: Adam Soltys
adam.bio: Adam is a software engineer who believes that the adoption of sound money will drive global prosperity. He lives in North Vancouver with his wife, daughter, and son.

cole.name: Cole
cole.bio: Cole is a driven individual with a passion for freedom, captivated by Bitcoin since 2015. His mission is to spread the adoption of Bitcoin and the Lightning Network across diverse communities globally.

locations.description: Over 500 businesses worldwide are accepting bitcoin with Coinos. We hope that yours will be next!

error.message: Please try again or contact support.

cost.question: What does it cost?
cost.answer: Receiving payments is free. Sending to other Coinos accounts is free. Withdrawals to external wallets are free if you use the same network you received on, otherwise there's a 0.4% fee for Bitcoin or 0.1% for Lightning or Liquid.

compatibility.question: Do I need any special device or software?
compatibility.answer: Coinos works on any device that has Internet and a web browser. You can receive payment notifications within the app, via email or push notification. We do have PoS terminals and receipt printers available for those who prefer physical notifications.

pos.question: Can Coinos integrate with my existing PoS?
pos.answer: We can log sales into Square automatically. On other systems you might choose to record Bitcoin sales under "cash".

bitcoin.question: What can I do with Bitcoin?
bitcoin.answer: Spend it at other merchants, convince your staff, landlord or suppliers to let you pay your expenses with it, or hold it as an investment.

step1.description: A username and password is all you need to get started.

step2.description: The same as you normally would, but with bitcoin.

step3.description: Easy, right? Tell us when you're ready for us to promote your business to the Bitcoin community!

jobs.pitch1: Coinos is actively looking for developers to join our growing team (full-time or part-time, remote working OK).
jobs.pitch2: Excited about working on open source bitcoin? Then take a look at our repositories on
jobs.pitch3: If you think you can make an impact, we'd love to hear from you. Send us your resume to

landing.header_after_icon: way to get started with bitcoin.
landing.subheader: A free web wallet and payment page for everyone.

info1.title: Instant payments via Lightning
info1.description: We make it easy for merchants to receive retail payments. No waiting for bank settlements or worrying about chargebacks. Instant settlement, in seconds. Say goodbye to 3% card fees.

info2.title: Simple to use
info2.description1: Just enter an amount in your local currency, share the QR code and you’re done.
info2.description2: We do all the heavy lifting so you can focus on your business.
info2.description3: You always have the option of taking custody of your funds by withdrawing instantly at any time.

info3.title: Brand it your way!
info3.description: Customize your profile page look and feel, or keep it on default - it's totally up to you.

login.resetSent: A password reset link will be sent to your email if we have it on file.
login.resetDesc: Please send an email with your username and any other details you can recall to
login.passwordRecommendation: We recommend using a long, random password if you intend to keep funds in your account.

user.noMessages: You have not sent or received any messages
user.welcome: Welcome! Your account balance is empty. You can start by making a deposit or by asking someone to pay you.

dashboard.conversionFeeWarning: You will be charged a 1% withdrawal fee on the amount.

receive.lessThan1BTCWarning: Please enter an amount less than 1 bitcoin.

send.placeholder: Enter an address, invoice or username

settings.confirmAutoWithdrawalDesc: Your auto withdrawals have been disabled. Please double check your destination address before re-enabling them or remove the address to dismiss this message.
settings.tipDesc: Default tip percentage when auto-paying trusted users
settings.name: Name
settings.memoPromptPlaceholder: e.g. Please enter your name for the order
settings.destinationDesc: The address that withdrawals will be sent to
settings.destinationPlaceholder: Enter a Bitcoin, Liquid or Lightning address
settings.reserveDesc: The amount to be left in your account after the withdrawal is complete
settings.thresholdDesc: When your balance exceeds this amount, a withdrawal will be triggered
settings.autoWithdrawDescription: Enable withdrawals to an external address when your balance reaches a given threshold
settings.pushNotificationsDesc: Get payment notifications on your device
settings.pushNotificationsDisabled: You've denied notification permission on this device. Check your browser settings if you want to undo that.
settings.notificationsDesc: Receive an email whenever a payment lands in your account
settings.nostrDescription: Your nostr secret key is used to sign and decrypt messages, keep it safe or someone may be able to impersonate you.
settings.nwcDescription: Enable nostr apps to send payments from your account
settings.seedDescription: This 12 word seed phrase is used to derive your nostr private key and your self-custodial wallet keys which determine your auto-withdrawal addresses. Back it up and don't let anyone see it.
settings.emailDescription: For password resets and payment notifications
settings.clickBelow: Click below to finish setting up your account
settings.aboutPlaceholder: A little something about you or your business address and hours
settings.emailNotificationsDescription: Get notified via email when a change occurs on your account or when people send you payments.
settings.smsNotificationsDescription: Coinos will send you text notifications when this is enabled.
settings.tipPromptDescription: Ask people if they want to add a tip before paying their invoices
settings.themeDescription: Select from the default color themes.
settings.securityPINDescription: Set a security pin that will be used to unlock your settings and to send outgoing payments.
settings.autoLockDescription: Time after which your PIN needs to be re-entered:
settings.twofaDescription: Add an extra level of security to your device by enabling 2-factor authentication.
settings.nip5b: as your publicly verified nostr address

support.fillForm: Fill out this form or email us directly at
support.doOurBest: and we'll do our best to get back to you in a timely manner.
support.beInTouch: Someone will be in touch shortly.

payments.giftDesc1: Whoever opens the link below will receive all the available funds.
payments.giftDesc2: If they are logged in, the funds will go to their account, otherwise a new account will be generated.
payments.failedToRoute: Failed to route payment, recipient may not be reachable. Try sending a smaller amount or increasing the max fee reserve.
payments.voucherText: Enter an ecash token or lnurlw code
payments.ecashDesc: Ecash tokens are funded with bitcoin. They may be redeemed in exchange for a lightning payment equal to their value or loaded back into a coinos account at any time. They can also be transferred to other ecash wallets either wholly or partially. You might use them to give bitcoin to someone who doesn't have a wallet by texting the token to them or sharing a link to it. Learn more at
payments.maxFeeDesc: Set an upper limit on the network routing fee. If set too low the payment may fail. You can set it higher and try again. We debit the full amount while attempting the payment but credit back any unused portion.
payments.describeOrder: Use this field to describe your order
payments.dontDeposit: Please don't deposit other Liquid assets
